unittitle_ssm: Bruce Nelson Research Files on Maritime Workers
abstract_ssm: Historian Bruce Nelson is the author of Workers on the Waterfront: Seamen, Longshoremen, and Unionism in the 1930s (1990). This collection contains files on prominent radical sailors who were members of the National Maritime Union, and files on several maritime labor events and on related organizations. The files include Nelson's correspondence with these sailors, detailed summaries (or, in the case of Joseph Stack, transcripts) of oral histories, printed ephemera and internal National Maritime Union documents, in particular from the post-World War II period of internal struggle between the union's Communist and anti-Communist factions.
